title: BREAKING GROUND AND STARTING A NEW GARDEN-PREPARING #garden

subtasks: Arranging for assistance to plow the land
Performing manual labor to plow the untillable ground
Conducting a pH test on the soil
Applying lime and fertilizer to the garden plot
Removing rocks, sticks, and roots from the soil
Considering expansion of the garden plot
Implementing measures to prevent grass growth in the garden
Assessing the condition of an existing garden and addressing issues
Installing wiggle wire and plastic covering
Utilizing the greenhouse for year-round plant growth
